channel.title: Pk Point Problem
channel.description: Well, I made pk-armor fairly hard to get, but when I logged into my server today, literally every player had full vesta/statius. I would like to know how to disallow players from earning pk points from the same player more then once when you defeat them, I've tried researching, but haven't found it.

item.title: Pk Point Problem
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

Well, I made pk-armor fairly hard to get, but when I logged into my server today, literally every player had full vesta/statius. I would like to know how to disallow players from earning pk points from the same player more then once when you defeat them, I’ve tried researching, but haven’t found it.

Read full topic
